info.first: We provide solutions for complex IT security challenges in multicultural environments, with good delivery experience regarding costs, timing and quality for you business.

info.quart: Our comprehensive services provide the technological and industrial expertise, solutions, skills, management frameworks and processes our customer needs to successfully design, operate and enhance their commercial applications.

info.beforeLast: We, HyperCube are leaders in the continuous innovation of technologies and services in finance, telecommunications and cyber-security. Our one-stop shop supports you from design to integration of complex solutions (high availability, data centers, backbones and distribution networks, etc.).
info.last: To provide the most complete solutions available on the market and allow customers to focus on the core business. We, HyperCube provide efficient technology and IT solutions that achieve business goals in complex environments. HyperCube works closely with your company to better understand your goals. Our rapid response and in-depth understanding of market dynamics allow us to create and deliver ideal IT and IT solutions. We reorganize our business and transform it into technology.

header.question: Seeking a reliable technology partner?
header.answer: At HyperCube, we support you in all, from strategic thinking and conception to operational implementation and close production, all around the world.
header.project: Our work speaks louder than us.
header.project_description: In every step we take to take your business to the next level, we do so with expertise, effectively, a unique way, and with passion.
header.talk: Write it to us, at HyperCube the first thing we do is to listen to you before anything else, that why we are the greatest listener in the country.
header.info: We, HyperCube are a leading ICT integrator with leading edge technology and a comprehensive portfolio. HyperCube was founded in 2014 and through strategic partnerships and market positioning has grown from strength to strength.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: We, HyperCube deliver a wide range of services, including analyzing, defining, designing, and implementing successful road maps of IT transformation to develop your business performance.

network.title: Networks
network.description: Against the backdrop of hyperconnected ecosystems, we, HyperCube provide cost-effective and efficient network-managed solutions, from satellite service to local networks, to optimize your business productivity.

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Withing a global landscape that is highly competitive and diverse, we, HyperCube simplify the process of integration solutions for your business with the best resources to ensure smooth and successful execution of the desired service.

security.title: Security
security.description: Through analysis, study, and recommendation of security standards, we, HyperCube define cybersecurity strategies, integrate solutions, secure infrastructures, and therefore ensure the integrity and confidentiality of your company data.

digital.title: Digital
digital.description: From website to mobile application through complex eCommerce solutions, we, HyperCube design and implement cost-effective and efficient digital solutions for your business.

solutions.nofound: Yub! That's all. Come back soon for more services.

projects.title: Our projects
projects.description: Find here the different types of projects undertaken by HyperCube, as well as the partners or clients with whom was realized.

lan.title: LAN (Local Area Network) Project Ministries
lan.subtitle: National Agency of State Information Systems
lan.description: In 2018, ANSIE is officially launching the modernization of the central administration networks with bidder HyperCube. The objective is to implement a reliable, efficient and secure network in the 24 ministerial departments. The LAN (Local Area Network) is supposed to solve organizational problems, such as overheating of cables and their wear due to humidity, the problem of interconnection between the various offices of the central administration, and in particular, the problem of deterioration of cables by rodents, a major cause of disruption of communication infrastructure.

interconnexion.title: Interconnection Project
interconnexion.subtitle: National Social Security Fund (CNSS)
interconnexion.description: In late 2020, CNSS decided to strengthen its interconnection capacity between its local and regional sites with bidder HyperCube. We, HyperCube delivered, installed and configured the AF-5U airFiber antennas to provide a solution to their problems. The AF-5U airFiber antenna is a device that offers exceptional performance, thanks to the innovative solutions applied in its manufacture. Once in use, it does not interfere with the operation of other devices.

evisa.title: Electronic Visa Project
evisa.subtitle: General Directorate of the National Police (DGI) and the International Organization for Migration (OIM)
evisa.description: In 2018, the government of the Republic of Djibouti, through the Directorate General of the National Police, implemented a secure online electronic visa system (e-Visa). This system aims on the one hand to facilitate and secure the processing of visas, and on the other hand to facilitate the entry of travelers to Djibouti. In January 2021 IOM, in close collaboration with the General Directorate of the National Police, officially launched version 2 of the e-Visa process, which aims to update the visa application procedures and add functionalities to solve the problems identified in version 1 of e-Visa.

ecertificat.title: Electronic Certificate Project
ecertificat.subtitle: Ministry of National Education and Vocational Training (MENFOP)
ecertificat.description: Suspendisse tincidunt, arcu nec faucibus efficitur, justo velit consectetur nisl, sit amet condimentum lacus orci nec purus. Mauris quis quam suscipit, vehicula felis id, vehicula enim.

fiberoptic.title: Fiber Optic Project
fiberoptic.subtitle: Djibouti Telecom and Ethio Telecom
fiberoptic.description: In 2020, Djibouti Telecom and Ethio Telecom jointly launched the renovation with the bidder HyperCube. This project will enable both operators to fully meet Ethiopia's current and future growing connectivity and data needs. In addition, this interconnection link, based on the latest technologies, will provide enhanced high capacity services while ensuring optimal quality of service meeting international standards.

atsplus.title: ATS+ Project
atsplus.subtitle: Central Bank of Djibouti and Central Bank of Somalia
atsplus.description: In 2019, ANPI officially launched the process of implementing an automated transfer system or ATS+ with Montran to modernize our country's financial infrastructure. The automated transfer system allows local economic and financial operators to make secure payments in real time, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. It handles very high volumes of small and large value payments, such as wire transfers, direct debits and checks, and combines an efficient and reliable service with strong position-keeping and intraday cash management facilities. In partnership with Montran, we, HyperCube, delivered the equipment to the central bank safely. The HyperCube team then installed and configured the equipment.

pki.subtitle: National Agency of State Information Systems
